name: Boost to the Other Side Many Times (sprint 2)
name_original: Boost to the Other Side Many Times (sprint 2)
description:
Please play in fullscreen.

Controls:

Press 'a' to turn left. Press 'd' to turn right. Press spacebar to boost.

Notes:

There is no sound, so the volume bar does nothing. There is no pop-up menu so pressing ESC does nothing. To get back to the main menu, you will have to refresh the page. Pressing quit will crash the game and you will have to reload the page to play it again.

There is a new landing system <---- Click for tutorial.

Feedback Form: https://forms.gle/cz9Zbqq51asF8XzVA

Tip: Go slow.
